availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Amos West and Elizabeth Robbins West. Married to Mariah Barton Smoot West in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on May 21, 1827. Father of John West, Sarah West, William West, Mary West, Elizabeth M. West, George B. West, Virginia West, Laura West, Emma West, and Martha West. Married to Rosanna Hughes West in Nicholas County on October 13, 1863. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #000252411, p. 265.
William Henry Perrin, Robert Peter, and O.L. Baskin, History of Bourbon, Scott, Harrison and Nicholas Counties, Kentucky (Chicago: O.L. Baskin & co.,1882), 770.
